import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' function ProductScreen({ }) { const params = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(`${params.id}`)) }, [dispatch, params]) return (
Indietro

{product.name}

{product.name}
{product.description}
 Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 1 ? 'Disponibile' : 'Esaurito'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( )) } )}
) } export default ProductScreen
